text: Ana ne'mo'a mopa rehankorino haveramina zogi atreteno, anampina knare'nare waini rampa'a hankari'ne. Hagi anama huteno'a ana hozafina, mani'neza hozama kegavama hanaza nona kisga huno zare kinte'ne. Ana huteno hozamofo amu'nompina waini rgama regatati'ma hu keria have taga huno tro hunte'ne. Hagi anama huteno mani'neno, knare krepi raga rentenefi huno'ma keana, akake krepi raga rente'ne.
